## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cb4c725718310cb969ec6171fad585bea2b58fc7d4460be6b706cb8529356d7a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vue-cli-plugin-lint-staged' @ 9.9.7 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
